resources.string:
You can help improve our application by sending - Nordic Semiconductor anonymous statistics on how you interact with the app. You can enable/disable this feature at any time in Settings. 

 What kind of information do we collect? 

 We collect only anonymous information about user interaction with the application e.g. we may want to check how often some feature is used by measuring number of clicks on a button which opens the feature. 

 Data provided by the user like file names or provided in a text input are never collected. 

 How do we use this information? 

 The information is used to analyze an user interaction with the application and determine areas of improvement. 

 How is this information processed and shared? 

 Firebase is used for collecting and processing data. All data collected is anonymous and no personal data is ever collected. IP address is set to anonymized when using Firebase. 

 We do not share the data to any third-party companies or individuals other than Google.
Click this button to change analytics permission settings.
